member.name: M:Alexandria.net.API.WalletFunctions.Transaction.publish_feed(System.String,System.Decimal)
member.summary: A witness can Public a price feed For the SPHTX:SBD market. The median price feed Is used To process conversion requests from SBD To SPHTX.
member.param: The witness publishing the price feed

member.name: M:Alexandria.net.API.WalletFunctions.Transaction.set_voting_proxy(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Set the voting proxy For an account. If a user does Not wish To take an active part In voting, they can choose to allow another account to vote their stake. Setting a vote proxy does Not remove your previous votes from the blockchain, they remain there but are ignored. If you later null out your vote proxy, your previous votes will take effect again. This setting can be changed at any time.
member.param: the name Or id Of the account To update
the name Of account that should proxy To, Or empty String To have no proxy

member.name: M:Alexandria.net.API.WalletFunctions.Transaction.withdraw_vesting(System.String,System.Decimal)
member.summary: Set up a vesting withdraw request. The request Is fulfilled once a week over the next two years (104 weeks)
member.param: the amount of vests to withdrawover the Next two years. Each week (amount/104) shares are withdrawn And depositted back as STEEM. i.e. "10.000000 VESTS"

member.name: M:Alexandria.net.API.WalletFunctions.Transaction.Transfer(System.String,System.String,System.Decimal,System.String)
member.summary: Transfer funds from one account To another. SPHTX And SBD can be transferred.
member.param: The account the funds are coming from
The account the funds are going To
The funds being transferred. i.e. "100.000 SPHTX"
A memo For the transactionm, encrypted With the To account's

member.name: M:Alexandria.net.API.WalletFunctions.Transaction.transfer_to_vesting(System.String,System.String,System.Decimal)
member.summary: Transfer STEEM into a vesting fund represented by vesting shares (VESTS). VESTS are required To vesting For a minimum Of one coin year And can be withdrawn once a week over a two year withdraw period. VESTS are Protected against dilution up until 90% Of STEEM Is vesting.
member.param: The account the SPHTX Is coming from
The amount Of STEEM To vest i.e. "100.00 SPHTX"

member.name: M:Alexandria.net.API.WalletFunctions.Witness.get_active_witnesses
member.summary: Returns the list Of witnesses producing blocks In the current round
member.returns: Returns json object combining list of active witnesses

member.name: M:Alexandria.net.API.WalletFunctions.Witness.get_miner_queue
member.summary: Returns the queue Of pow miners waiting To produce blocks.

member.name: M:Alexandria.net.API.WalletFunctions.Witness.get_witness(System.String)
member.summary: Returns information about the given witness.
member.param: the name Or id Of the witness account owner, Or the id of the witness
member.returns: the information about the witness stored In the block chain

member.name: M:Alexandria.net.API.WalletFunctions.Witness.list_witnesses(System.String,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Lists all witnesses registered In the blockchain. To retrieve all witnesss, start by setting 'lowerbound' to the empty string '""', and then each iteration, pass the last witness name returned as the 'lowerbound' for the next 'list_witnesss()' call.
member.param: the name Of the first witness To Return. If the named witness does Not exist, the list will start at the witness thatcomes after 'lowerbound'
the maximum number Of witnesss To return (max: 1000)
member.returns: Returns a list Of witnesss mapping witness names To witness ids

member.name: M:Alexandria.net.API.WalletFunctions.Witness.update_witness(System.String,System.String,System.String,Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JArray)
member.summary: Update a witness Object owned by the given account.
member.param: The name Of the witness's owner account. Also accepts the ID of the owner account Or the ID of the witness.
Same as for create_witness. The empty string makes it remain the same.
The New block signing public key. The empty string makes it remain the same.
The chain properties the witness Is voting On.

member.name: M:Alexandria.net.API.WalletFunctions.Witness.Vote(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int16)
member.summary: Vote on a comment to be paid Sophia
member.param: The author Of the comment To be voted On
The permlink Of the comment To be voted On. (author, permlink) Is a unique pair

member.name: M:Alexandria.net.API.WalletFunctions.Witness.Vote(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Vote for a witness to become a block producer. By default an account has not voted positively Or negatively for a witness. The account can either vote for with positively votes Or against with negative votes. The vote will remain until updated With another vote. Vote strength Is determined by the accounts vesting shares.
member.param: The account voting For a witness
The witness that Is being voted For
true if the account Is voting for the account to be able to be a block produce
